scripts.build:win: pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/WebDS.exe && mkdir -p release && powershell Compress-Archive -Path dist/WebDS.exe -DestinationPath release/WebDS-win-x64.zip
scripts.build:mac: pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/WebDS-mac-x64.app && pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output dist/WebDS-mac-arm64.app && mkdir -p release && zip -r release/WebDS-mac-x64.zip dist/WebDS-mac-x64.app && zip -r release/WebDS-mac-arm64.zip dist/WebDS-mac-arm64.app
scripts.build:linux: pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/WebDS-linux-x64.bin && pkg . --targets node18-linux-arm64 --output dist/WebDS-linux-arm64.bin && mkdir -p release && tar -czf release/WebDS-linux-x64.tar.gz -C dist WebDS-linux-x64.bin && tar -czf release/WebDS-linux-arm64.tar.gz -C dist WebDS-linux-arm64.bin
scripts.build:all: npm run build:win && npm run build:mac && npm run build:linux
